channel.title: Posts on Albert Sucks
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Albert Sucks

item.title: First Post
item.description: Hello and welcome to Albert Sucks, the one and only blog dedicated to NYU’s terrible terrible web design. The point of this blog is to dissect precisely how and why NYU’s web design sucks. You see, I am a developer. I’ve done my fair share of web development, specifically React/Redux with ES6+ if you’re into buzzwords. And having peeked behind the curtain that is HTML, CSS and JavaScript, I can tell you that NYU’s websites are worse than you think, are worse than you can imagine.
